sentences.sContent: She spent her life pandering to the wants of her children.
sentences.sCn: 她一生都在设法满足子女的需要。

sentences.sContent: The gallery closed down for want of funding.
sentences.sCn: 那家画廊由于缺乏资金关闭了。

sentences.sContent: ...if you want to try to shut me down...
...Don’t miss it!If you have any question or want more information...
...I’m not happy and I want to change and I’m done with this...
...so if you want to apply for a master’s degree...
...he quotes Google co-founder Larry Page to the effect that the perfect search engine will understand exactly what i mean and give me back exactly what i want...
...We are unsure of ourselves and want to be liked by everyone...
...Women want to be able to do it all volunteer for school parties or cook delicious meals，and so their answer to any request is often Yes...
...we should be delighted to pursue knowledge for its own sake--even when what we find out is something we didn't particularly want to 36...
...Being overworked or over-committed at home and on the job will not get you where you want to be in life...
...I want my students to search out the answers to questions by using all the resources available to them...

phrases.pCn: 你想要什么；你想怎么样
无论你要什么；不管你想要什么
试一试；想试试，想要试一试

words.tran: 欠缺的；不足的；不够格的

trans.tranOther: something that you need or want
